column1: Mass of Christian Burial will be held on Thursday
column3: 2015 at 10:30 a.m. at All Souls Catholic Church in Bridgeport with Fr. Dave Rykwalder officiating.  Burial will follow at Oregon Trail Memorial Cemetery.  A rosary will be Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. at the church with visitation from 3- 6:30 p.m. at the church.
